video_prompt: An anime-style girl with long brown hair and blue eyes is sitting on a suitcase on a stone pavement. She is wearing a school uniform consisting of a white blouse, blue skirt, and knee-high socks. The background features a brick wall and a street lamp. The girl is looking around and speaking, asking if there is any kind-hearted young man who can take her away. The scene is static with no significant changes in the background or the girl's position.

speech_prompt.speaker: the girl
speech_prompt.text: Is there any kind-hearted young man who can take me away?
